languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, мы получили сигнал с мира Фолстоун. С нами связались служители Ордена Молота, почитатели святого Когнация, чей монастырь является единственным поселением на планете".
"Lord Captain, we have received a transmission from Foulstone. It was sent by members of the Order of the Hammer, votaries of Saint Cognatius, whose monastery is the only settlement on the planet."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, мы получили сигнал с мира Фолстоун. С нами связались служители Ордена Молота, почитатели святого Когнация, чей монастырь является единственным поселением на планете".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, we've received a transmission from Foulstone. It was sent by members of the Order of the Hammer, worshippers of Saint Cognatius whose monastery is the only settlement on the planet."
"Lord Captain, we've received a transmission from Foulstone. It was sent by members of the Order of the Hammer, worshippers of Saint Cognatius whose monastery is the only settlement on the planet."

"Lord Captain, we have received a transmission from Foulstone. It was sent by members of the Order of the Hammer, worshippers of Saint Cognatius, whose monastery is the only settlement on the planet."

"Lord Captain, we have received a transmission from Foulstone. It was sent by members of the Order of the Hammer, votaries of Saint Cognatius, whose monastery is the only settlement on the planet."

languages.text: “舰长大人，我们收到了来自荒寂岩地的信息，是重锤修会的修士发来的。他们是圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的忠诚信徒，他们的修道院也是这颗行星上唯一的定居点。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a transmission from Foulstone. It was sent by members of the Order of the Hammer, votaries of Saint Cognatius, whose monastery is the only settlement on the planet."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我们收到了来自荒寂岩地的信息，是圣锤修会的修士发来的。他们是圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的忠诚信徒，他们的修道院也是这颗行星上唯一的定居点。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, hemos recibido una transmisión desde Rocainmunda. La envían miembros de la Orden del Martillo, devotos de san Cognatius, cuyo monasterio es el único asentamiento del planeta».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a transmission from Foulstone. It was sent by members of the Order of the Hammer, votaries of Saint Cognatius, whose monastery is the only settlement on the planet."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, hemos recibido una transmisión desde Rocainmunda. La envían miembros de la Orden del Martillo, devotos de san Cognatius, cuyo monasterio es el único asentamiento del planeta».

languages.text: "Lord Captain, wir haben eine Nachricht aus Foulstone erhalten. Sie stammt von Mitgliedern des Ordens des Hammers, die den Heiligen Cognatius verehren und deren Kloster die einzige Siedlung auf dem Planeten ist."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a transmission from Foulstone. It was sent by members of the Order of the Hammer, votaries of Saint Cognatius, whose monastery is the only settlement on the planet."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a transmission from Foulstone. It was sent by members of the Order of the Hammer, votaries of Saint Cognatius, whose monastery is the only settlement on the planet."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons reçu une transmission de Rochepeste. Elle provient des membres de l'Ordre du Marteau, des disciples de Saint Cognatius, dont le monastère est la seule colonie sur la planète. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a transmission from Foulstone. It was sent by members of the Order of the Hammer, votaries of Saint Cognatius, whose monastery is the only settlement on the planet."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nous avons reçu une transmission de Rochepeste. Elle provient des membres de l'Ordre du Marteau, des disciples de Saint Cognatius, dont le monastère est la seule colonie sur la planète. »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ファウルストーンから通信が届きました。送信元は、鉄槌の修道会の一員である、聖コグナティウスの信者達ですね。惑星で住める建物は、彼らの修道院だけです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a transmission from Foulstone. It was sent by members of the Order of the Hammer, votaries of Saint Cognatius, whose monastery is the only settlement on the planet."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ファウルストーンから通信が届きました。送信元は、鉄槌の修道会の一員である、聖コグナティウスの信者達ですね。惑星で住める建物は、彼らの修道院だけです」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Menfurtaş'tan bir ileti aldık. Aziz Cognatius'un izinden giden Çekiç Tarikatı mensuplarınca gönderilmiş. Gezegendeki tek yerleşim yeri olan manastırın sahibiler."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have received a transmission from Foulstone. It was sent by members of the Order of the Hammer, votaries of Saint Cognatius, whose monastery is the only settlement on the planet."
